answers.answer: you should fast I went for mine and ate jelly drank juice and ate things that bring your sugar high and mine came out high
I fasted before my one hour test. Failed. I fasted before my three hour test. Passed with flying colors. A lot of women fail the first and then take the second and everything turns out fine
I didn't fast for mine and I passed it the first time. Don't worry about it too much. You will be fine.

I was eating 	a mcmuffin in the waiting room when I went roentgen one hour one with my first pregnancy lol. Don't think you have to fast per se but it would probably be best to stay away from sugary food.
theres a couple different tests. one you fast for, one you dont. so just follow your dcotors instructions

Everyone is different. I didn't fast for my 1 hour and the test was high. Fasted for my 3 hour and tests were still high now I check my levels 4 times a day and am on a special diet. But with my first baby I had no problems. Most women who fail the first test are fine after the 3 hour it's just a weeding out process and if you have a family history of diabetes and/or GD you run a higher risk for it too. For me, unfortunately basically everyone in my family is diabetic so I'm super predisposed for it lol either way, good luck and don't stress!!
I just had an appointment and I have it!
